title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document functional and non-functional requirements for the HolographicFashionProjector.

title: Design Holographic Projection System
description: Develop a design for the holographic projection system, including hardware and software components.

title: Create Wearable Device Design Blueprints
description: Design the wearable device that will house the holographic projection system.

title: Develop Holographic Clothing Models
description: Create 3D models of various clothing and accessories that can be projected by the device.

title: Implement Wearable Device Firmware
description: Develop the firmware for the wearable device to handle user interaction and holographic projection.

title: Develop Mobile App for User Interaction
description: Build a mobile app to allow users to browse and select clothing options.

title: Perform System Integration Testing
description: Test the overall functionality and performance of the wearable device, holographic projection system, and mobile app.
dependencies: Develop Mobile App for User Interaction

title: Deploy HolographicFashionProjector to Users
description: Prepare the product for public release and coordinate deployment efforts.
